title: ‘When Riders Express Concerns, It Worries Me:’ Hansen Welcomes Urgent UCI Review of Hookless Rims and Tires
content:
Riders’ association president identifies several areas of concern he hopes the UCI will study.

Read the full article at ‘When Riders Express Concerns, It Worries Me:’ Hansen Welcomes Urgent UCI Review of Hookless Rims and Tires on Velo.
author: sstokes
